column2: it had the same lovely char that I crave
column3: the nice sear on the outside
column4: and great pink center with the red eye that is the hallmark of a medium rare done right. The cooking was even throughout
column5: just the way you want it
column6: even with the high sear. It is a balancing act that is deceptively difficult to pull off. It is what separates the great steakhouses from the very best steakhouses. They executed perfectly!
